quest.name: Silent Banquet
journal: This Oroniri youth is most grateful to the Qestir.
objectives: Speak with Baidur and obtain a can of horse milk.
Speak with Chambui and obtain a drumstick of beast meat.
Speak with Uto and obtain smoked fish.
Deliver the food to the Oroniri youth.

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: There is a matter I require your help with.

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: I want to show my appreciation to the Qestir for creating Reunion. The marketplace allows us both to trade and communicate with the other tribes. We would have struggled to do either before Reunion was set up.

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: After speaking with my fellow traders, we decided that we would host a banquet for the Qestir. However, three of them are still yet to deliver their food for the feast.

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: I am still waiting on Baidur, Chambui, and Uto. Please, seek them out and tell them you wish to discuss the banquet.

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: I am still waiting on Baidur, Chambui, and Uto. Please, seek them out and tell them you wish to discuss the banquet.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Oh, my apologies for being so late. We Kahkol are still few in number and it took somewhat longer than anticipated to gather what we required.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: However, I can assure you it will have been worth the wait! I made sure to collect only the finest ingredients to show our gratitude to the Qestir.

dialogue.name: CHAMBUI
dialogue.text: Ah, the banquet? Do not worry, my contribution is ready. I have been incredibly busy of late and it completely slipped my mind.

dialogue.name: CHAMBUI
dialogue.text: Our tribe's hunters are so skilled we often have more food than we know what to do with. Having somewhere like Reunion where we can trade our unnecessary meat is a great help to us.

dialogue.name: UTO
dialogue.text: My apologies for the delay. Though I think the Qestir will enjoy what I have brought: smoked fish straight from Isari.

dialogue.name: UTO
dialogue.text: I would normally not go to such lengths, but the Qestir have done so much for us.

dialogue.name: UTO
dialogue.text: The mere fact they allow non-Xaela into Reunion is truly commendable. No doubt their generosity is motivated by trade, but I would be lying if I said it was not the reason that I too come here.

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: Were you able to find all three traders?

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: Have you ever heard why the Qestir founded Reunion? They say a Qestiri child died from an illness that would have been treatable with the right medicine. Alas, the Qestir had no means of procuring the cure at the time.

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: As you say, there are plenty of other popular theories that may be true. The Qestir are hardly going to open their mouths and tell us which is correct after all.

dialogue.name: ORONIRMAN02752
dialogue.text: Not that it really matters a great deal. We owe them a huge debt regardless.
